# bottomLeft

**Instance Property**

The lower-left corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
var bottomLeft: CGPoint { get }
```

## Identifying the Corners of a Detected Rectangle

- **bottomRight**: The lower-right corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.
- **topLeft**: The upper-left corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.
- **topRight**: The upper-right corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.
